channel.title: People cant connect[508]
channel.description: Well, this is my first 508 server, ive owned a 317 before.(not on this computer, this ones new) Heres the problem, while the server IS running, i cant add it to the server status. Ive had one person try to log in, and he couldnt. Ive even set my environment variables like you do on 317(like i said this is my first 508) I just rechecked before i posted this. I made a new ip from no-ip, i checked the port,(43594)and i can log in....i do have the 508 cache where its supposed to be. this should answere some of your answeres: *jdk 1.6.0.14 *jre 1.6.0 *no-ip IS downloaded *environment variables are with right jdk vsn *i have compiled successfully *i have tried another source *no-ip is running Sooo, hopefully help?

item.title: People cant connect[508]
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Lol i hadnt made a server in so long i forgot it, but now i portforwarded with utorrent.

Read full topic

item.title: People cant connect[508]
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Did you make an exception for your port in your router/modem? If you haven’t made an exception for port 43594, then the status page will not be able to connect, setting it to the default Offline.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

K i edited the ip address in client.java(very bottom) that might fix there problem, but the server status says its offline.

thnx for replying lol

item.title: People cant connect[508]
item.dc:creator: @xxpun1sh3rxx xxpun1sh3rxx
item.description:
@xxpun1sh3rxx wrote:

I’ve had the exact same problem. How I fixed it? I told my friend to download a client [508] with an ip changer cuz the one he had stayed at 0.0.0.0. You get what I mean? Try and see if this works. Hope I helped!

Read full topic

item.title: People cant connect[508]
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

Well, this is my first 508 server, ive owned a 317 before.(not on this computer, this ones new)
Heres the problem, while the server IS running, i cant add it to the server status. Ive had one person try to log in, and he couldnt.
Ive even set my environment variables like you do on 317(like i said this is my first 508) I just rechecked before i posted this.
I made a new ip from no-ip, i checked the port,(43594)and i can log in…i do have the 508 cache where its supposed to be.
this should answere some of your answeres:
*jdk 1.6.0.14
*jre 1.6.0
*no-ip IS downloaded
*environment variables are with right jdk vsn
*i have compiled successfully
*i have tried another source
*no-ip is running
Sooo, hopefully help?

Read full topic
